adoptablePets.name: Luna
adoptablePets.description: Luna is a gentle, loving dog who gets along great with children and other pets. She's house-trained and knows basic commands.
adoptablePets.medicalInfo: Up to date on vaccinations, spayed

adoptablePets.name: Shadow
adoptablePets.description: Shadow is a curious and affectionate cat who loves to explore. He's great with other cats and enjoys interactive play.

adoptablePets.name: Buddy
adoptablePets.description: Buddy is a calm, well-mannered dog perfect for families. He loves walks and is excellent with children of all ages.

adoptablePets.name: Whiskers
adoptablePets.description: Whiskers is a beautiful, fluffy cat with a sweet disposition. She enjoys quiet environments and loves being petted.

adoptablePets.name: Max
adoptablePets.description: Max is an intelligent, protective dog who bonds strongly with his family. He needs an active home with experienced dog owners.

adoptablePets.name: Mittens
adoptablePets.description: Mittens is a playful kitten with stunning blue eyes. She's very social and would do well with other cats or as an only pet with lots of attention.
adoptablePets.medicalInfo: Age-appropriate vaccinations, scheduled to be spayed

adoptablePets.name: Charlie
adoptablePets.description: Charlie is a gentle rabbit who enjoys being petted and is litter trained. He would make a wonderful companion for a quiet household.

adoptablePets.name: Bella
adoptablePets.description: Bella is a sweet, medium-sized dog with a gentle nature. She loves going for walks and playing fetch in the yard.

successStories.story: Rocky was adopted by the Johnson family in 2023 and has become the perfect companion for their two young children. He loves playing in their backyard and has brought so much joy to their home.
Princess was a shy cat who needed extra patience and love. Sarah provided exactly that, and now Princess is a confident, happy cat who loves to curl up on Sarah's lap while she reads.
Duke was adopted by the Martinez family and has become their hiking companion. He's helped them stay active and has made their outdoor adventures even more enjoyable.

events.title: Weekend Adoption Drive
events.description: Join us for our monthly adoption drive! Meet dozens of loving pets looking for their forever homes. All adoption fees reduced by 50%.

events.title: Free Vaccination Clinic
events.description: Free vaccinations for pets of families in need. Sponsored by local veterinarians and FurEver Care. No appointment necessary.

events.title: Pet Training Workshop
events.description: Learn basic training techniques and socialization tips from professional trainers. Open to all pet owners, refreshments provided.
